summary: Eola, Namira\'s emissary is now a Dunmer
descriptionHtml:
This mod change\'s both Eola\'s race and outfit into items found in Morrowind, courtesty of Dragonborn DLC.

Revamped a litte basically both in appearance and race. 

She is:

- A Dunmer female
- Purpled eyed (Karlia has this normally but thought vot-ze-hell.)
- Wears Dunmer commoner clothing (Dragonborn)
- Jester Shoes (goes sorta with the clothes)
- Mythic Dawn gloves (goes with the clothes)
- Lots of offensive and defensive spells but still handy with one handed weapons.

To those who is not sure who is Eola, she is that cannibal Daedra worshiper found in Markarth\'s hall of the dead where you can either kill or accompany her to get Namira\'s ring.
author: Christof
